title: Rabbis Visit Cleveland & LA
body: Rabbis Harav Dov Landau, Harav Chaim Peretz Berman, Harav Eliezer Yehuda Finkel, and Harav Avraham Salim embark on a US trip, visiting Cleveland and Los Angeles to support Keren Olam HaTorah.

title: Rabbi Leah's Shalom Bayis Retreat
body: Rabbi Leah Richeimer invites wives to recharge at the Shalom Bayis Retreat, a chance to rediscover joy and reconnect amidst life's demands.

title: President Trump Mourns Rabbi Hauer
body: President Trump and First Lady sent a condolence letter to the Orthodox Union following the sudden passing of Rabbi Moshe Hauer, 60, on Shemini Atzeres. He served as the organization's Executive Vice President.

title: Attack on Frum Man in Lakewood
body: A young man in his mid-twenties was hospitalized in Lakewood, NJ after a brutal unprovoked assault by an assailant who targeted pedestrians. The victim was walking with friends on Vermont Avenue when a vehicle pulled over and the attack occurred. The motive behind the assault is unknown.
